Flamethrower.desc: Add 5 Fire tiles into random columns in the board.

Geode.desc: Add 5 Earth tiles into random columns in the board.

PuffPendant.title: Puff Pendant
PuffPendant.desc: Add 5 Air tiles into random columns in the board.

BrawnBroth.title: BrawnBroth
BrawnBroth.desc: Add 5 Muscle tiles into random columns in the board.

Molotov.desc: Deal 40 damage to your opponent. Inflict Burning on all tiles in a small area. Discard 1 random hex.

Leeches.title: Leeches!
Leeches.desc: Gain a buff that heals you for 30% of all damage you deal. Lasts 1 turn.

ProteinPills.title: Protein Pills
ProteinPills.desc: Gain a stacking buff that increases the damage you deal and reduces the damage you take by 20%. Lasts 2 turns

RollingBone.title: Rolling Bone
RollingBone.desc: Discard your hand and draw that many hexes.

ComebackBrace.title: Comeback Brace
ComebackBrace.desc: Gain a buff that makes you invulnerable to damage. Lasts 2 turns.

EvilDoll.title: Evil Doll
EvilDoll.desc: Persist: Deal damage to the opponent equal to the amount of health you healed this turn.

Lifestealer.desc: Persist: Deal 20 damage. Heal 20 health. Gain a stacking buff that increases the damage you deal and reduces the damage you take by 10%. The buff lasts 5 turns.
